short_summary: Purchase, delivery, and extallation of office seating.
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number EB129-231748/A dated March 14, 2023 with a closing of April 05, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerrhos/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supplly Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/000/PQ and covers a requirement from the following product sub-category (ies) of the SA: - Product sub-category 1 - Rotary chairs and stools; Bedford Insitute of Oceanography (BIO). -Facility for Intelligent Marine Systems (FIMS) has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Dartmouth, Nova Scotia by August 16th, 2023. This NPP covers a requirement to be solicited amongst the PSIB Suppliers (SA holders). If you wish to find out how you can be a pre-qualified SA holder, please contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Office Seating under SA for BIO, FIMS

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3885450905
* **Publication Date**: April 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 28, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 16, 2023
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Tender Description

This tender announcement supercedes and cancels previous bid solicitation number EB129-231748/A dated March 14, 2023. The solicitation will provide a debriefing or feedback session upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation. This notice is issued pursuant to the PSPC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/000/PQ and covers a requirement for office seating under the following product sub-category(ies):
* Product sub-category 1: Rotary chairs and stools
* Product sub-category 1: Modular executive office packages

Facility for Intelligent Marine Systems (FIMS) has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Dartmouth, Nova Scotia by August 16th, 2023. This solicitation will be issued amongst the pre-qualified SA holders. Interested providers are encouraged to contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca to learn about the qualification process.

#### Solicitation Method

This solicitation will be conducted through a Competitive - Selective tendering method.

#### Selection Criteria

The selection of the successful tenderer shall be based on the lowest price. 

#### Attachment Information

No attachments are included with this solicitation. 

#### Notice URL

The full solicitation package can be downloaded from: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15989466?extsite=MTU5ODk0NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
* **Name**: Maryse Cyr
* **Email**: maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 
* **Fax**: 

Please ensure all submissions are made
